amendment.description: To provide authority to transfer naval vessels to certain foreign countries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3431 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3431 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To provide authority to transfer naval vessels to certain foreign countries.
